---
category: news
title: "UIC researcher to test voice-activated AI to manage mental health symptoms"
excerpt: "The first part of the two-phase, five-year project will develop and test a voice-enabled, AI virtual agent named Lumen, trained to deliver Problem Solving Therapy (PST), for patients with moderate, untreated depressive and/or anxiety symptoms."
